sourcesContent:
const cards = [
    {
        firstname:
            "Grandpa",
        lastname:
            "Scamshield",
        picture:
            "https://i.postimg.cc/VkkTdcq9/scamshield.jpg",
        bonus:
            "Grandson: Ask for help from the player of your choice (only move one space)",
        malus:
            "Lumbago: Cannot move on this turn.",
    },
    {
        firstname:
            "Techie",
        lastname:
            "Grandma",
        picture:
            "https://i.postimg.cc/9FVsH9zn/clickfast.jpg",
        bonus:
            "Water Aerobics: Adds 5 extra seconds to answer the card.",
        malus:
            "Arthritis: You can only move one space on your next turn.",
    },
    {
        firstname:
            "Uncle",
        lastname:
            "Distrust",
        picture:
            "https://i.postimg.cc/637mrJ8d/Screenshot-2024-12-03-at-21-47-55-ENGLISH-GAME-TEAM-13-Google-Docs.png",
        bonus:
            "Retirement Tax: Cannot receive penalties on this turn.",
        malus:
            "Unexpected Nap: Skip your next turn.",
    },
    {
        firstname:
            "Granny",
        lastname:
            "Firewall",
        picture:
            "https://i.postimg.cc/9FpKmf7F/firewall.jpg",
        bonus:
            "Herbal Tea: Move one extra space after your next correct answer.",
        malus:
            "Memory Loss: You won’t be able to play on your next turn.",
    },
    {
        firstname:
            "Rookie",
        lastname:
            "Senior",
        picture:
            "https://i.postimg.cc/kgcz9yrt/Screenshot-2024-12-03-at-21-48-08-ENGLISH-GAME-TEAM-13-Google-Docs.png",
        bonus:
            "Elder Walker: Move 2 additional spaces.",
        malus:
            "Lost Glasses: Lose 5 seconds to answer the card.",
    },
    {
        firstname:
            "Grandad",
        lastname:
            "The Grey",
        picture:
            "https://i.postimg.cc/FRLV7TCV/9e34d17e-1432-43c1-9572-5515847595b0.jpg",
        bonus:
            "Nurse: Last player on the board helps you. If correct answer, he advances 1 space.",
        malus:
            "Wheelchair: Cannot overtake players on the next 2 turns.",
    }

];

export default cards;
